columns.text:
Welcome to Aquaria Villa Santorini

If you are looking for a shelter of calm, luxury and comfort in Santorini, Aquaria Villa is the perfect accommodation for you. It can host large families and parties of friends or wedding receptions in an inspiring setting filled with light and designed especially to combine modernity and Cycladic tradition.

The highlight of the property though, is the small and picturesque St’Catherine’s church where you may realize your wedding ceremony and afterwards celebrate these precious moments with your friends and relatives at the garden that can host up to 200 persons! The smallest members of the family will find their own paradise at the lovely playground that is the perfect addition to this amazing villa.

Undeniably, there are a lot of reasons that will make it challenging to leave the idyllic surroundings of this place. Especially in the evenings when the cool breeze accompanies you, it is time to gather in one of the three outside lounges with your loved ones and relax, having the time of your life!

Welcome to Aquaria Villa and enjoy your vacations in Santorini, staying at one of the most wonderful places to be!.

items.title: Villa At A Glance
items.description: A comfortable studio with a double bed, kitchen and bathroom.
items.excerpt: A comfortable studio with a double bed, kitchen and bathroom.
items.amenities:
• Two master Bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms
  • Main master Bedroom with walk in closet
  • 4 Bedrooms, with ensuite bathrooms
  • Private oversized fresh water pool
  • Private Sea View Terrace with Pool lounge, Sun Loungers and umbrellas
  • Spacious living room
  • 3 dining areas (2 indoor & 1 outdoor)
  • Fully equipped kitchen
  • Fully equipped laundry room
  • Private st. Catherine’s chapel
  • Private vegie garden with local products
  • 2500sqm garden
  • Kids’ garden playground
  • Kids’ indoor playroom
  • Free private spacious parking

items.seo_description: Villa at a Glance has a lavish interior of 450 sq. m, 6 bedrooms, private oversized pool, private chapel & 2500 sq.m garden. Book this villa today!

items.title: Ayoba Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Ayoba Santorini

Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth.

Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! It is slang for “cool, alright, ok”. In Zulu, it means “will be”. Ayoba is a feel-good word. It takes us to our a happy place. A place that’s more than alright actually, better then cool: the ravishing slice of Santorini. Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. The secluded location of Ayoba will evoke your senses as you peacefully surrender to the ageless spell of Santorini.
items.excerpt: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description:
Welcome to Villa Dakoronia Santorini

‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view.

Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience.

Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.
